title: Hiver & Nancy with Maze Media Ltd

signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for ways to improve efficiency and automation in their processes.
signals.context: Marketing agency, currently using Hiver in one department for finance and accounts.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a solution that can help their team manage emails more effectively without having to reference multiple sources.
signals.context: Team members need to draft replies and summarize email threads efficiently.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about the cost of additional features and whether they will provide enough value to justify the expense.
signals.context: Considering a paid upgrade for AI features after a trial period.

signals.problem_statement: The customer requires a way to automate the tagging and assignment of emails based on specific criteria.
signals.context: Finance team needs to manage a high volume of emails efficiently.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is interested in AI capabilities that can learn from their specific processes and improve over time.
signals.context: Looking to leverage AI for better email management and response drafting.
